name: db-astro-suite
description: A suite of Astro tools with Python backends and Go generators.

scripts.build: pnpm build:hub && pnpm build:starwizz && pnpm build:collect
scripts.build:collect: mkdir -p hub/dist/analog/public/starwizz && cp -rv tools/starwizz/dist/starwizz/browser/* hub/dist/analog/public/starwizz/ && cp hub/dist/analog/public/index.html hub/dist/analog/public/404.html
